text: Mule Barn Theatre, also known as the David Rankin Mule Barn , was a historic barn located at Tarkio, Atchison County, Missouri. It was built as a barn about 1891 and converted to a theatre by the former Tarkio College in 1966–1968. It was an octagonal plan, three story, red brick building. It was destroyed in a 1989 fire.Atchison County National Register Listings It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1970 and delisted in 1994. ==References== Category:Octagon barns in the United States Category:Former National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Barns on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Theatres on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1891 Category:Theatres completed in 1968 Category:Buildings and structures in Atchison County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Atchison County, Missouri
title: Mule Barn Theatre
